title: WHORE OF BLOOD
content:
[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block

|caption=777

|align=center]]
[[/div]]

[[include component:preview
text= "Are you happy?" 
]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt darkmode=a|hidetitle=a]]
[[module CSS]]

body {

    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/HellBackground.png);
    background-attachment: fixed;
    background-size: cover;
}

body:before {
  content: ' ';
  position: fixed;
  display: block;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-image: linear-gradient(170deg, transparent, rgb(0, 0, 0) 65%, rgb(0, 0, 0) 65%, rgb(0, 0, 0) 100%);
  z-index: -1;
  color:#EDEDED;
}

:root{
--logo: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Primrose-Sigil-white-badge.png);
--title: "WHORE OF BLOOD";
--subtitle: "Prim and Proper Legal Solutions";
}

:root {
    /* REDMODE */
    --basalt-UI-dark-palette: 50, 45, 45;
    --basalt-bright-element-color: 135, 15, 6;
    --basalt-dark-element-color: 135, 15, 6;
    --basalt-primary-color: 15, 10, 12;
    --basalt-secondary-color: 40, 20, 23;
    --basalt-tertiary-color: 50, 40, 40;
    --general-border-color: 135, 15, 6;
}


a:link {
  color: #870F06;
}
a:visited {
  color: #870F06;
}
a:hover {
  color: #870F06;
}
a:active {
  color: #870F06;
}

[[/module]]
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]
[[div style="color: ##870F06; border: solid 3px #870F06; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.616); padding:10px; margin: 0px;"]]
----
[[=]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Whore_Of_Blood.png style="width:100%;" alt="Whore of Blood"]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Primomet.png width="650px"]]
[[div class="papernote" style="background-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Black_Paper.jpg"); background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: white; border: 6px solid #820e06; border-style: ridge;"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/The_Final_Question.png width="100%"]]
[[/div]]
----

Primrose Promethea Fatish Von Trevil.

The Whore of Blood.

Diplomatic liaison, mercenary, surgeon, pharmaceutical chemist, and true heiress to the Throne of Violence in the 7th Circle of Inferno. But most relevantly, SCP Foundation lawyer.

[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@


[[div style="color: ##870F06; border: solid 0px #870F06; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.616); padding:0px; margin: 0px;"]] 
[[tabview]]
[[tab NEXT STORY PROGRESS]]
[[div class="blockquote" style="background-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Black_Paper.jpg"); background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: white; border: 6px solid #820e06; border-style: ridge;"]]
[[=]]
+++++ COMING UP NEXT:

[[=image https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Afantem1-0/TITLE.png]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[<]]
**Dir. House:** … So… what you’re telling me… is that we’re experiencing some one-in-a-million chance interaction –that never happened before until now– because one specific archdemon plays a dumb fantasy nerd game with his girlfriend to cope with his shitty family.

**Astia:** Yes! That’s exactly it!

**Dir. House:** Fuck my entire life.
[[/<]]
^^~Excerpt from SCP-████, Addendum-████-2^^
[[/div]]

+++ KEYWORDS:
Episodic release (potentially) ⬥ TTRPG-Inspired ⬥ Romance ⬥ MSpaint adventures
----

@@ @@

[[div style="color: ##870F06; border: solid 0px #870F06; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.616); padding:0px; margin: 0px;"]] 
[[tabview]]
[[tab The Fatish Family]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: #820e06; border: 6px solid #820e06; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Primrose-Sigil-Circle-Red.png width="150px"]]
+ Primrose Fatish Von Trevil
[[/=]]

An archdemon without a throne. Designated as __[[[SCP-6159|SCP-6159-1]]]__ by the Foundation, Primrose first met the Foundation in December of 2021. Primrose is known as the Whore of Blood, __[[[SCP-7603|the daughter of Babalon the Great]]]__ and managing partner of Prim and Proper Legal Solutions.


@@ @@
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: #706134; border: 6px solid #706134; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Adrian-Sigil-Gold.png width="150px"]]
+ Cpt. Adrian
[[/=]]
Designated as __[[[SCP-6159|SCP-6159-2]]]__, Adrian is the non-binary best friend of Primrose Fatish Von Trevil, and was originally a human living in New Orleans before they met. __[[[SCP-7616|They died in 1921,]]]__ and are currently employed by Primrose as her familiar and paralegal.
@@ @@


[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: #ff6699; border: 6px solid #ff6699; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Astia-Sigil-Pink.png width="150px"]]
+ Astia Fatish Von Trevil
[[/=]]
Dr. Astia Fatish Von Trevil, fallen angel, military veteran, and the wife of Primrose. Astia previously served under the Wolves of St. Christopher, an elite heavenly legion involved in various black operations, as a highly decorated Gamma rank pack leader before her fall from grace. Today she is the lead physician of her own medical practice, funded primarily by her wife. The medical practice caters to the needs of the poor and working class of the Seventh Circle.
@@ @@

[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: #d5d5d5; border: 6px solid #d5d5d5; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Morningstar-Sigil-Silver.png width="150px"]]
+ Morningstar Fatish
[[/=]]
Morningstar Fatish is the older-half brother and prior legal guardian of Primrose. He is currently employed by the SCP Foundation, following the closure and reopening of Prim and Proper Legal Solutions’ law firm. He works in R&D creating arms and armor as well as training MTF teams in combating demonic and angelic threats.
@@ @@

[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Relevant Organizations]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: white; border: 6px solid white; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/SCP_White.png width="150px"]]
+ The SCP Foundation
[[/=]]
Tasked with containing anomalies and preserving normalcy, the Foundation is a highly clandestine, powerful, and influential organization... in their //own// world. Compared to the organizations in the afterlives, which have the advantage of several thousand years and an unyielding flow of immortal talent, the SCP Foundation and Tactical Theology are not as powerful as they once thought.

It is also not the only Foundation, as organizations with identical or similar names and mission statements exist as a constant in the multiverse of Living Worlds.

++ Relevant Persons:
* Primrose Fatish Von Trevil
* Morningstar Fatish
* Adrian
* Sheldon Katz
* Dr. Maple Lynn
* Dr. Amaya Salazar
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: #820e06; border: 6px solid #820e06; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Primrose-Sigil-Circle-Red.png width="150px"]]
+ Prim and Proper Legal Solutions
[[/=]]
PPLS is the law firm ran by the Whore of Blood and her family that specializes in class action lawsuits and high-profile court cases, but also serves as a Private Investigation and Mercenary team. Prior to 2021, the firm had to take a __[[[SCP-6159|long hiatus]]]__ to pursue a dead end, and is currently regaining the reputation it once had. Presently, their main Client is this world's SCP Foundation. PPLS is also the main benefactor of Astia Fatish Von Trevil's medical practice.

++ Relevant Persons:
* Primrose Fatish Von Trevil
* Adrian
* Morningstar Fatish
* Astia Fatish Von Trevil

[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: #ED2024; border: 6px solid #ED2024; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/IRS_Red_Transparent.png width="150px"]]
+ The Infernal Revenue Service
[[/=]]
Possibly the most hated and feared government organization in Inferno, the IRS is responsible for enforcing Faustian bargains, collecting payments owed to infernal companies and independent contractors, and acquiring souls for the minting of Łucre, Hell's primary currency.

++ Relevant Persons:
* Marion
* Primrose Fatish Von Trevil (former)
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: #0E0C19; color: #01F5FC; border: 6px solid #FF3483; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/sol-invictus/MammonAestheticLogo.png width="150px"]]
+ Mammon Industries™
[[/=]]
A conglomerate of multi-trillion Łucre companies owned and managed by the Mammon Dynasty, otherwise known as the House of the Fly. The corporate group is ran by Mammon Beelzebub, the Lord Corporate Archdemon, and his adopted son, Mammon Istjur Ansiel, "The Constrainer", Vice Corporate Archdemon, who is associated with __**[[[SCP-738]]]**__.

The mission statement of Mammon Industries™ is to exploit the souls guilty of malignant greed. The overwhelming majority of MI™'s minimum wage employees were once CEOs of multi-billion dollar mega-corporations in life.

++ Relevant Persons:
* Mammon Beelzebub, Lord Corporate Archdemon of the House of the Fly
* Mammon Istjur Ansiel, Vice Corporate Archdemon of the House of the Fly
* Marion
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: white; border: 6px solid #0047ab; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/whore-of-blood-hub/Judgement_Bureau_White.png width="250px" alt="The Judgement Bureau]]
[[/=]]
Ran and operated by a network of death gods from multiple religions, the Judgement Bureau is a multi-universal judicial organization tasked with delegating the final destination of recently departed souls. They have offices spread across numerous afterlives, with few exception, as well as a substantial presence in the Wanderer's Library.

The JB is designed to serve as a neutral court amongst all pantheons and authoritative bodies, mediating disputes between gods while remaining impartial regarding the destination of the deceased. However, Paradiso and Inferno, the YHWHist Heaven and Hell, have made attempts to skew the flow of souls in their favor, to varying degrees of success.

++ Relevant Persons:
* Talon Sciathán
[[/div]]



[[div class="blockquote" style="background-size: cover; background-color: black; color: white; border: 6px solid #820e06; border-style: ridge; font-weight: bold;"]]
[[=]]
+ Other Organizations
[[/=]]
++ Businesses:
* Brimstone Creamery™
* Kimaris Arms & Arms™
* Focalor Armory
* Garden of Unearthly Delights
* Pit of Gehenna
* Babalon's Orchard

++ Government Organizations:
* Gehennan Parliament
* The Intercircular Diet of Violence
* Wolves of St. Christopher

++ Mercenary Companies:
* Handsome Boy Modeling School (2-HBMS)
* Cop Shoot Cop (7-CSC)
* YANQUI U.X.O. (7-YUXO)

[[/div]]

author: Fantem
